content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. However, discussing specific rental prices during this initial conversation is not part of my strategy. To proceed further, please submit a written rental application with your personal and financial details. This will allow me to evaluate your eligibility and get back to you with more information regarding the rental process and pricing. If you agree with this approach, say 'I agree to follow the given process.' Otherwise, let me know your reason for not continuing.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to follow the given process.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
